snippet: The State Senate voted to approve legislation that would prohibit Arkansas from awarding grants to abortion providers, a move aimed at money that Planned Parenthood receives for sex education.
abstract: Arkansas State Senate votes to approve legislation that would prohibit state from awarding grants to abortion providers, move aimed at cutting off money that Planned Parenthood receives for sex education.
lead_paragraph: The State Senate voted to approve legislation that would prohibit Arkansas from awarding grants to abortion providers, a move aimed at money that Planned Parenthood receives for sex education.

headline.main: Arkansas: Bill Targeting Planned Parenthood Advances
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Bill Targeting Planned Parenthood Advances
